attributes.action: Remove all unnecessary decorative and festive illuminations erected on buildings
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I feel that ALL decorative festive lighting (i.e fairy lantern style lights, rope lights, large inflatables ect ect) should be completely removed from buildings (both private and public) by the 1 February after the previous christmas. 
I feel that the lights are using un-necessary energy and by cutting the amount of "antisocial" bulbs used, we can help save the planet. 
I also feel that having christmas decorations still errected, is extreme bad luck.
Please support me on this as it is a subject close to my heart.
